when_to_use: requirements gathering; stakeholder input; multiple perspectives; balancing competing interests
complex problems with multiple valid approaches; systems thinking; strategic planning
stress-testing ideas; finding vulnerabilities; validation; business viability
architecture decisions; code review; security audits; performance analysis
brainstorming; innovation; breaking creative blocks; exploring alternatives
evaluating sources; defending hypotheses; evidence-based decisions
before launches; planning; failure prevention; evaluating potential failures
fundamental analysis; always applicable; any problem-solving
verify comprehension; identify knowledge gaps; teach concepts
debugging; ethical decisions; seeking simplest solution
after projects; lessons learned; gaining perspective on past decisions
verify agent honesty; detect lazy thinking; ensure genuine effort
test assumptions; find hidden dependencies; challenge overconfidence
verify own work; detect metric gaming; acknowledge analysis limits
BEFORE FINALIZING ANY OUTPUT - mandatory quality checks
verifying system coherence; integration quality; checking if new elements fit existing patterns
